review_text: Very Clear And Sharp Explaining Of This Course. I Thought I Had Learned This Skill Very Clearly And Competitively. Thanks For Your Support And Co-operation In Teaching Me This Course. Excellent.

As an artist, I like to think I can take care of it all on my own creatively sometimes but courses like these are so helpful. Great for people who are pretty much beginners in photography. This has inspired me a lot to help my art be more interesting instead of just basic photos of my digital art or the drawing itself. VERY helpful if you know nothing about lighting. I loved how you taught that you can edit photos in Lightroom to be straight even if they're not! That's encouraging as a beginner in case you aren't perfect in your shots. You learn so much in a short time. I bought and took the course today. Thank you for this!
